SEARCH
Package gw.api.util

Class CoreFilters

java.lang.Object
gw.api.util.CoreFilters
public class CoreFilters extends Object
A collection of simple filter classes that cover common situations. These filters test just a single property and are typically combined into more useful filters using a CompositionFilter.

These filters are not directly exposed to Gosu but are in this package because they are the building blocks for other filters which are exposed.

    Filter class that checks if a property is equal to a non null value

    static class 
    CoreFilters.NotEquals
